title: Adam Klein (Survivor contestant)
summary: Adam Scott Klein (born January 15, 1991) is a keynote speaker and former homeless shelter manager best known for competing on the American reality show Survivor. He was voted the winner of the show's 33rd season, Survivor: Millennials vs. Gen X in 2016. He returned for the show's 40th season Survivor: Winners at War, where he finished in 12th place.
